value.name: San Francisco police release video of deadly shooting
value.description: The two-minute video from the injured officer shows the confrontation that took place inside the Amazon Barber Shop with 21-year-old Jehad Eid, who later died at a hospital. Police told the town ...

value.name: Lawsuit Filed Against SFPD Over Deadly Barbershop Shooting
value.description: The family of Jehad Eid, who was fatally shot during a confrontation with San Francisco police in a barbershop earlier this year, have filed a lawsuit accusing the department of excessive force.
